name: Indicates if the adverse event was absent
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Quality Information - QI-Core)
description: When true, the resource implies that the adverse event did NOT occur during the stated time period. If true, the severity should not be specified, and the certainty value will be ignored.

element.short: Indicates if the adverse event was absent
element.definition: When true, the resource implies that the adverse event did NOT occur during the stated time period. If true, the severity should not be specified, and the certainty value will be ignored.
